title: nf-core/grim pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input. Supports two formats: 1) Individual file paths, or 2) Phoenix output directory

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

gamma_ar_file.errorMessage: GAMMA AR file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.gamma'

amrfinder_report.errorMessage: AMRFinder report file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.tsv' or '.txt'

phoenix_assembly_fasta.errorMessage: Phoenix assembly FASTA file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fasta', '.fa', or '.fna' (optionally gzipped)

ont_complete_genome.errorMessage: ONT complete genome FASTA file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fasta', '.fa', or '.fna' (optionally gzipped)

oneOf.description: Format 2: Phoenix run directory with process subdirectories (contains phoenix_summary.tsv and sample subdirectories with process-organized files)

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces. This should match the name of the subdirectory in phoenix_outdir.

phoenix_outdir.errorMessage: Phoenix run directory must be provided and must exist. This directory should contain phoenix_summary.tsv and sample subdirectories with process-organized files (e.g., run_001/SAMPLE_001/PROCESS_NAME/file.txt).

ont_complete_genome.errorMessage: ONT complete genome FASTA file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fasta', '.fa', or '.fna' (optionally gzipped)
